titleStmt.title: Some particulare actes made by our Soveraine Lord his commissioner and estates in the Parliament holden at Edinburgh the 24 of Iune 1609 by his most Excellent Majesties speciall direction, recommended to the estates in Parliament, and by them grauelie and maturelie advised: for the which they render all thankes of God with their humble and heartie prayer for his Maiestie to raigne long over his dominiones.
Laws, etc.
titleStmt.author: Scotland.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Charteris, Printer to the Kings Most Excellent Majestie,

notesStmt.note: At foot of title: Cum priuilegio regio.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Edinburgh. Library.
